title: Ep 303: He's Back, Edgelord Millionaire

description:
Bobby is a Charlie Brown tree. Khalyla creates cat controversy with Kevin Hart's bodyguards. Gilbert signs the papers. We talk about Bobby's time in Hungary, trading hall passes, JLC, and the Robin Williams of Long Beach.
